objects.name: Analytic 1129
objects.description: Discovery of SaaS services connected to productivity platforms (e.g., Microsoft 365, Google Workspace). Defender perspective includes unexpected enumeration of enabled services, API integrations, or OAuth applications tied to user accounts.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Get-MsolServicePrincipal, ListAppRoles: Service discovery operations executed by accounts not normally performing administrative tasks

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:signinlogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: UserLogin: Discovery operations shortly after account logins from new geolocations

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Specific Office Suite applications or plugins that may be enumerated or targeted.
Geographic deviation threshold for discovery actions linked to recent logins.
